abstract: Eric Grode reviews production of play A Felony in Blue, or Death by Poker, which is written, directed by and stars Rome Neal at the Nuyorican Poets Cafe.
snippet: “A Felony in Blue, or Death by Poker,” by Daniel Gallant at the Nuyorican Poets Cafe, focuses on five mob bosses and a suspicious dealer who hold a territory-carving card game.
lead_paragraph: “A Felony in Blue, or Death by Poker,” by Daniel Gallant at the Nuyorican Poets Cafe, focuses on five mob bosses and a suspicious dealer who hold a territory-carving card game.

headline.main: A Card Game Played With High Stakes
